citation.publisher: Ofice for Official Publications of the European Communities
citation.title: Working Conditions in Hospitals in the European Union

policy.title: Factsheet 29 - Safety and Health Good Practice on-line for the Healthcare Sector

source.name: European Agency for Safety and Health at Work
source.description: The European Agency for Safety and Health at Work (EU-OSHA) is a decentralised agency of the European Union with the task of collecting, analysing and disseminating relevant information that can serve the needs of people involved in safety and health at work.
